name: Mr Nibbles Forever
description: Endless runner, platformy goodness wrapped in the cutest package! Everyone's favourite hamsternaut is back! Escape the cage, avoid spiders, collect nibbles and rocket to the moon!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 300 MB RAM Graphics: Intergrated Gfx DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 180 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Any modern Windows Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: Any Modern Graphics Card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I love the idea of this game,the hamsters are cute,The gameplay changes with every costume. Btw put more hamster costumes !!!
This game is a super cute way to waste some time. You get to play with hampsters in fun little outfits, what's not to like?
